Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes the rental improvement fund pilot program to provide capital grants to small landlords to renovate rental units in certain cities
Summary: Establishes the rental improvement fund pilot program to provide capital grants to small landlords to renovate rental units in certain cities; creates the rental improvement fund.
LawCode: Add Art 33 §§1300 & 1301, Priv Hous Fin L; add §99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the rental improvement fund pilot program
